c:simple-property.name: augeasModuleName
c:simple-property.description: the name of the Augeas module/lens to use for loading and updating this resource's configuration

c:simple-property.name: configurationFilesInclusionPatterns
c:simple-property.description: the absolute path of the samba configuration

c:simple-property.name: workgroup
c:simple-property.description: The workgroup your server will appear to be in when queried by clients

c:simple-property.name: server string
c:simple-property.description: Value that will display in the printer comment box in print manager

c:simple-property.name: enableRecycleBin
c:simple-property.description: Enable recycle bin for all the shares. Deleted files or directories will be copied to a .recycle under the tree.

c:simple-property.name: security
c:simple-property.description: The type of authentication used by Samba

c:simple-property.name: encrypt passwords
c:simple-property.description: This option must be enabled if the clients are connecting from a Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0 with Service Pack 3, or other more recent versions of Microsoft Windows. The passwords are transfered between the server and the client in an encrypted format instead of in as a plain-text word that can be intercepted.

c:simple-property.name: load printers
c:simple-property.description: Controls whether all printers in the printcap will be loaded for browsing by default

c:simple-property.name: cups options
c:simple-property.description: Free form string of options passed to cups library

c:simple-property.name: idmap uid
c:simple-property.description: Specifies range of users ids that are allocated for use in mapping Linux users to NT user SIDs

c:simple-property.name: idmap gid
c:simple-property.description: Specifies range of group ids that are allocated for use in mapping Linux groups to NT group SIDs

c:simple-property.name: winbind enum users
c:simple-property.description: Allow enumeration of user info

c:simple-property.name: winbind enum groups
c:simple-property.description: Allow enumeration of group info

c:simple-property.name: winbind separator
c:simple-property.description: Character used when listing a username in the DOMAIN\user format

c:simple-property.name: augeasModuleName
c:simple-property.description: the name of the Augeas lens to use for loading and updating this resource's configuration

c:simple-property.name: configurationFilesInclusionPatterns
c:simple-property.description: the absolute path of the samba configuration

c:simple-property.name: name
c:simple-property.description: Name of share

c:simple-property.name: path
c:simple-property.description: Directory to which the user of the service is to be given access

c:simple-property.name: comment
c:simple-property.description: Comment string to associate with the new share

c:simple-property.name: browseable
c:simple-property.description: Controls whether this share is seen in the list of available shares

c:simple-property.name: read only
c:simple-property.description: Users of service may not create or modify files

c:simple-property.name: printable
c:simple-property.description: Clients may open, write to and submit spool files on the service directory

c:simple-property.name: write list
c:simple-property.description: List of users that are given read-write access to the service

c:simple-property.name: guest ok
c:simple-property.description: No password is required to connect

c:simple-property.name: share modes
c:simple-property.description: Enables or disables the honoring of the share modes during a file open

c:simple-property.name: valid users
c:simple-property.description: List of users that should be allowed to login to this service
